title: Deshabandu Thennakoon takes leave: Acting SDIG appointed for WP
body_lines: Western Province Senior DIG Deshabandu Tennakoon has taken a leave for 14 days, police said.
They said D.J Palihakkara has been appointed as the acting senior DIG in charge of the Western Province for the period.

Earlier, the Attorney General had instructed Inspector General of Police (IGP) C.D. Wickramaratne to transfer Senior DIG in charge of the Western Province Deshabandu Tennakoon in order to ensure there is no interference in the investigations that are being carried out currently over the incidents that took place on May 9.(DSB)
